mapper.select: ( SELECT A.id,A.parent_id,A.`name`,A.`level`,A.price FROM ezs_goods_class A WHERE A.`level` = 1 AND A.display = 0 AND A.deleteStatus = 0 ) UNION ( SELECT A.id,A.parent_id,A.`name`,A.`level`,A.price FROM ezs_goods_class A WHERE A.`level` = 1 AND A.display = 1 AND A.deleteStatus = 0 )

SELECT A.id, A.parent_id, A.`name`, A.`level`, A.price FROM ezs_goods_class A WHERE A.deleteStatus = 0 and A.id in (SELECT B.subtotal FROM ezs_subscribehq B WHERE B.id=#{userid}) AND A.parent_id=#{parentid}

SELECT A.id,A.parent_id,A.`name`,A.`level`,A.price FROM ezs_goods_class A WHERE A.`level` = 1
AND A.deleteStatus = 0
SELECT A.id, A.parent_id, A.`name`, A.`level`, A.price FROM ezs_goods_class A WHERE A.parent_id=#{parentid}

SELECT A.id, IF(ISNULL(B.`name`), A.`name`, CONCAT(B.`name`,"-",A.`name`)) name, A.parent_id, A.`level` FROM (SELECT C.id,C.`name`,C.parent_id,C.`level` FROM ezs_goods_class C WHERE C.id in (#{classids})) A INNER JOIN ezs_goods_class B ON A.parent_id=B.id

SELECT B.id, B.`name`, B.price FROM (
( SELECT E.goodClass_id FROM ezs_price_trend E
WHERE E.`status`=2 AND E.data_sources in (2,3)
WHERE E.`status`=2 AND E.data_sources in (1)
)
UNION ( SELECT E.goodClass_id FROM ezs_price_trend_xl E )
) A INNER JOIN ezs_goods_class B ON A.goodClass_id = B.id WHERE B.`level` in (${level}) AND B.deleteStatus=0
and B.parent_id in (${parentid})
GROUP BY B.id
